item.description: <p>The little girl&#x27;s siblings, police, and nurses have shared harrowing details of how the tragic death haunts them.</p>

item.title: Man dead after attempting to cross train tracks
item.description: <p>The 30-year-old man died at the scene. </p>

item.title: Chilling discovery in Antarctica that has scientists sounding alarm bells
item.description: <p>S﻿cientists have stumbled on an incredible discovery that could have far-reaching implications.</p>

item.title: More than a dozen arrested, two officers injured in Sydney protest
item.description: <p>More than a dozen people have been arrested, and two officers have been injured after pro-Palestinian protesters and police clashed in Sydney as demonstrators rallied against a military expo at the International Convention Centre. ﻿</p>

item.title: 'Anything's possible': RBA dodges Melbourne Cup Day surprise, and Aussies may be in for a rude shock next year
item.description: <p>The Reserve Bank has delivered on one of the most widely tipped Melbourne Cup Day wagers, but no-one&#x27;s happy about it.</p>

item.title: Authorities in two states charge 18 people in $60 million drug bust
item.description: <p>An alleged drug syndicate was allegedlly importing drugs via sea, and disguising them in consignments of shoes and plastics.</p>

item.title: Worker dies shortly after being freed from collapsed medieval tower in Rome
item.description: <p>D﻿espite authorities being able to retrieve the worker, he died a short time later.</p>
